remarks: Commutative/associative law for monoids, with an explicit commutativity hypothesis.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
statement:
mndcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mndcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mnd4g.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
mnd4g.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
mnd4g.3 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
mnd4g.4 $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
mnd12g.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( X .+ Y ) = ( Y .+ X ) ) $.
mnd12g $p |- ( ph -> ( X .+ ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( Y .+ ( X .+ Z ) ) ) $.
